mdRecord.dcterms:title: List to me: romance / words by F.C. Burnand ; music by E. Audran
List to me, the truth forgive
Audran, Edmond, 1842-1901. Cigale et la fourmi. Vocal score. English
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Audran, Edmond, 1842-1901 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: For vocal duet; orchestra accompaniment arranged for piano or organ. [original]
Title page illustration: Cartouche with Bromo-Seltzer bottle and a woman playing a Stieff piano. [original]
Imprint date from notice on p. [3]: "The above is a reproduction of the 24th page of woman's edition 'Washington Times', July 4, 1895." [original]
Advertisement on p. [3]: "Bromo-Seltzer .. for the cure of headache." [original]
English words; translated from the French of Chivot and Duru. [original]
